author: dlr
msg: Add the underpinnings for issue #2822, handling propagation of
mergeinfo for WC -> WC copy/move operations.
This commit makes WC -> WC copy/move operations now require repository
access (e.g. users may need to be online to use 'svn cp wcpath1
wcpath2' with a remote repository).  This breaks behavioral backward
compatibility.  The plan is to restore it through use of an option
and explicit mergeinfo for WC-local copy/move operations.
(do_wc_to_wc_copies): Rename local variable adm_access to dst_access
to better reflect what it is.  Add code to acquire a src_access
read lock for use with propagate_mergeinfo_within_wc(), and call
(do_wc_to_wc_moves): Rename local variable adm_access to dst_access
to better reflect what it is.  Call propagate_mergeinfo_within_wc().
expected mergeinfo and/or expected status for property merge of
(wc-wc-copy-move): Move remaining work to "compatibility mode" bullet.

author: hwright
msg: Fix an infinite loop when normalizing revisions for blame.
(normalize_revisions): When tacking extra revisions on the end, advance
the linked list pointer, so as to avoid a infinite loop.

author: hwright
msg: Fix a segfault when normalizing revisions for blame.
(normalize_revisions): When tacking extra revisions on the end, use the
current revision, not the revision of the (nonexistent) next node.

author: dlr
msg: Clarify inline comment about expected output (related to issue #571).

author: dlr
msg: Revert r26136, which will be handled under the auspices of issue #571,
